Rules: To move your piece you can click on a square that does not have any other pieces
Your piece can move one diagonal step forward or you can perform a jump
A jump is when your opponents piece is on a forward adjacent diagonal to your piece and the other side is an empty square
Performing a jump captures your opponent's piece and you can perform multiple in one turn (double jump)
Getting your piece to the opposite side of the board promotes it to a king, allowing it to move both forwards and backwards
The goal is to capture all of your opponent's pieces
